Module com.example.towersofhanoi
Package com.example.towersofhanoi.Controller

Class OptionsController

java.lang.Object
com.example.towersofhanoi.Controller.OptionsController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class OptionsController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The OptionsController class is responsible for controlling the options screen. It handles user interactions and settings related to game options such as the number of disks and move animation speed.

    • optionOnMouseClicked

      public void optionOnMouseClicked(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
      Handles the action when an option label is clicked. Updates the selected number of disks and changes the color of the clicked label.
      Parameters:
      e - the mouse event

    • backButtonOnAction

      public void backButtonOnAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent e) throws IOException
      Handles the action when the back button is clicked. Changes the color of the clicked button and navigates back to the menu view.
      Parameters:
      e - the action event
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs during the opening of the menu view

    • playNowButtonOnAction

      public void playNowButtonOnAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent e) throws IOException
      Handles the action when the play now button is clicked. Changes the color of the clicked button and hides the current window.
      Parameters:
      e - the action event
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs
